text: Þis sand þe landes imare at hamtune.
Arest of hefdeswelle on minnen linc.
Anlang diche on sture at oxene bricge unen up anlang sture at sudwde.
Of þane mapeldere be þane akere heueden on chelbrichtes dich.
Anlang cuterget mores on þane stream anlang streames.
On adwines imare þat eft on efdeswelle suthward.
